PolyPharma.neo4j_analyzer.Matrix_Interactome_DB_interface module¶

class PolyPharma.neo4j_analyzer.Matrix_Interactome_DB_interface.MatrixGetter(Connexity_Aware, full_impact)[source]¶

Bases: object

Builds an object that is used ans an interface between matrix representation of an interactome and the

Parameters:
  • Connexity_Aware (bool) – if set to True, loads only the elements of the main connex set of the database
  • full_impact (bool) – if set to True, will compare the names of entities and link the entities that has the same name with the “Possibily the same” relation
ReactionsList = [<bulbs.model.NodeProxy object at 0x617c3d0>, <bulbs.model.NodeProxy object at 0x617c490>, <bulbs.model.NodeProxy object at 0x617c550>]¶
Write_Connexity_Infos()[source]¶

Writes the infos about connexity of different components of a graph into the database for the future use. This execution is the main reason for the existance of the Adjacency Matrix.

Warning:This process has to ber re-run each time the underlying database is changed in a way that migh affect the main connex graph
build_extended_conduction_system(memoized=True, sourced=False, incremental=False, cancellation=True)[source]¶

Builds a conduction matrix that integrates uniprots, in order to allow an easier knowledge flow analysis

Parameters:
  • memoized – if the tensions and individual relation matrices should be stored in the matrix and dumped at the end computation (required for submatrix recomputation)
  • sourced – if true, all the raltions will be looked up and not computed. Useful for the retrieval of subcirculation group, but requires the UP2voltage_and_circ to be pre-filled
  • incremental – if True, all the circulation computation will be added to the existing ones. Usefull for the computation of particularly big systems with intermediate dumps
  • cancellation – divides the final current by #Nodes**2/2, i.e. makes the currents comparable between circulation systems of differnet sizes.
Returns:

adjusted conduction system

fast_row_insert(element, index_type)[source]¶

Performs an correct insertion of an edge to the matrix.

Parameters:
  • element (2- tuple of ints) – tuple of indexes designating elements we are willing to link
  • index_type (str) – type of the insert, so that the matrix coefficient can be looked up in the Adjacency_Martix_Dict or Conductance_Martix_Dict from the configs file
format_Node_props(node_current, limit=0.01)[source]¶
full_load_LS()[source]¶
Performs the loading of all the objects and the relations in the database according to the following algorithm:
  • get all the reaction nodes, i.e. reactions specified in the self.Reaction_List.
  • For each reaction, add the participants to the “seeds” list and create a set of groups linking them all together
  • for each element of hte “seeds” list, crawl the objects reachable from this seed by specific relations,

System Message: WARNING/2 (/home/ank/PycharmProjects/PolyPharma/PolyPharma/neo4j_analyzer/Matrix_Interactome_DB_interface.py:docstring of PolyPharma.neo4j_analyzer.Matrix_Interactome_DB_interface.MatrixGetter.full_load_LS, line 5)

Bullet list ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.

add those new elements to the list and remember as reachable from the current element of the seed list.

The relations are crawled in the following order:
  • “Group”
  • “Same”
  • “Contact_interaction” (repeated 5 times to increase as much as possible the main connex size, even for the knowledge groups that are badly represented in the interactome database)
  • “HiNT Contact_interaction”
  • “possibly_same”

System Message: WARNING/2 (/home/ank/PycharmProjects/PolyPharma/PolyPharma/neo4j_analyzer/Matrix_Interactome_DB_interface.py:docstring of PolyPharma.neo4j_analyzer.Matrix_Interactome_DB_interface.MatrixGetter.full_load_LS, line 13)

Definition list ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.

The exact relations in each group of relation abbreviations are specified in the configs.py file,

This function fills in the self.Set and self.Links elements of the MatrixGetter object

get_eigenspectrum(numberEigvals)[source]¶
Recovers the eigenspectrum associated to the n biggest eigenvalues, where n is specified by numberEigvals.
If the Adjacency and conductance matrix haven’t been preloaded first, will raise an Exception
Parameters:numberEigvals (int) – specifies how many biggest eigenvalues we are willing to get.
Raises Exception:
 “Matrix must be pre-loaded first” if self.Ajacency_Matrix and self.Conductance_Matrix have not been computed anew or pre-loaded first
get_normalized_laplacian(fudge=1e-18)[source]¶

Returns the normalized conductance matrix (Conductance matrix is actually the matrix laplacian of the associated Graph)

Parameters:fudge – Cancells out the action of eigenvalues that are too low.
Returns:normalized matrix
hacky_corr()[source]¶

Hacky method that should remain unused but by the devs. Generate the Uniprot_Mat_idxs from the loaded Uniprot List. Prefents a 90-minute full database reload to compute Sthing quickly.
